title: How to Make Chicken Crescent Rolls

steps.headline: Drain chicken, reserving juice for cheese sauce in a small saucepan.
Combine chicken, 1/2 of the cheese and about 1 tablespoon of the soup.
Put the rest of the cheese, the soup and the milk into the small saucepan, setting it on medium.
steps.description: Stir occasionally, heating until the cheese melts.

steps.headline: Meanwhile, Separate the crescent rolls into 8 triangles.
Divide the chicken mixture into 8 balls and put on the wide end of each triangle.
Start at the wide end of each triangle and roll to the opposite end.
steps.description: Make sure the dough covers the chicken mixture completely.

steps.headline: The cheese sauce should be done now.
steps.description: Pour about 1/2 cup of sauce in bottom of sprayed 8 or 9 inch (20.3 or 22.9 cm) square baking dish.

text: Drain chicken, reserving juice for cheese sauce in a small saucepan.  Combine chicken, 1/2 of the cheese and about 1 tablespoon of the soup.  Put the rest of the cheese, the soup and the milk into the small saucepan, setting it on medium. Stir occasionally, heating until the cheese melts. Meanwhile, Separate the crescent rolls into 8 triangles.  Divide the chicken mixture into 8 balls and put on the wide end of each triangle.  Start at the wide end of each triangle and roll to the opposite end. Make sure the dough covers the chicken mixture completely. The cheese sauce should be done now. Pour about 1/2 cup of sauce in bottom of sprayed 8 or 9 inch (20.3 or 22.9 cm) square baking dish. Arrange filled crescents over sauce.  Bake uncovered at 375 for 20-30 minutes.  Serve with remaining cheese sauce.
